list.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
list.author: Henry David Thoreau

list.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
list.author: Colin R. Davis

list.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
list.author: Albert Schweitzer

list.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
list.author: Bo Bennett

list.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
list.author: Vince Lombardi

list.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
list.author: Vidal Sassoon

list.quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
list.author: Orison Swett Marden

list.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
list.author: Aisha Tyler

list.quote: The secret of success is to know something nobody else knows.
list.author: Aristotle Onassis

list.quote: Success is not for the chosen few, but for the few who choose it.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.
list.author: Marlon Wayans

list.quote: Success is not the key to success. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
list.author: Ray Kroc

list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
list.author: Nelson Mandela

list.quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey.
list.author: Zig Ziglar

list.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
list.author: Robert Collier

list.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
list.author: Roy T. Bennett

list.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
list.author: Steve Jobs

list.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
list.author: Theodore Roosevelt

list.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
list.author: Sam Levenson

list.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

list.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
list.author: Gary Player

list.quote: The only way to predict the future is to create it.
list.author: Peter Drucker

list.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
list.author: Abraham Lincoln

list.quote: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
list.author: Les Brown

list.quote: Positivity always wins…Always.
list.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
list.author: Vince Lombardi

list.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
list.author: Walter Elliot

list.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
list.author: Confucius

list.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
list.author: Winston Churchill

list.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
list.author: George Washington

list.quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
list.author: Victor Hugo

list.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
list.author: Aisha Tyler

list.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
list.author: Nelson Mandela

list.quote: Perseverance is not giving up. It is persistence and tenacity, the effort required to do something and keep doing it till the end, even if it's hard.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
list.author: Nelson Mandela

list.quote: Perseverance is not a personality trait, it is an attitude we cultivate.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
list.author: Japanese Proverb

list.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
list.author: Newt Gingrich

list.quote: The only way to fail is to stop trying.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Perseverance is not for the faint-hearted. It requires strength, determination, and a will to keep going no matter what.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
list.author: Thomas Edison

list.quote: Perseverance is the ability to keep going in spite of obstacles. It is the determination to achieve your goals no matter what challenges you face.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
list.author: Sam Levenson

list.quote: Perseverance is not a one-time effort; it is a habit, a mindset, and a way of life.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom that springs from the soul.
list.author: Henry Ward Beecher

list.quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and give thanks continuously.
list.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

list.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
list.author: Anonymous

list.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
list.author: Melody Beattie

list.quote: The more you practice gratitude, the more you see how much there is to be grateful for.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
list.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

list.quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
list.author: Zig Ziglar

list.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
list.author: Melody Beattie

list.quote: Gratitude is a powerful catalyst for happiness. It's the spark that lights a fire of joy in your soul.
list.author: Amy Collette

list.quote: When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears.
list.author: Anthony Robbins

list.quote: Gratitude is the wine for the soul. Go on. Get drunk.
list.author: Rumi

list.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
list.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

list.quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
list.author: Zig Ziglar

list.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom that springs from the soul.
list.author: Henry Ward Beecher

list.quote: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
list.author: Eleanor Brownn

list.quote: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.
list.author: Audre Lorde

list.quote: An empty lantern provides no light. Self-care is the fuel that allows your light to shine brightly.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.
list.author: Deborah Day

list.quote: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others from the overflow. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
list.author: Eleanor Brownn

list.quote: Self-care is giving the world the best of you instead of what's left of you.
list.author: Katie Reed

list.quote: Taking care of yourself doesn't mean me first, it means me too.
list.author: L.R. Knost

list.quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
list.author: Lalah Delia

list.quote: The greatest wealth is health.
list.author: Virgil

list.quote: Taking care of yourself is part of taking care of others.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: You can't pour from an empty cup. Take care of yourself first.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Self-care is not a luxury; it's a necessity.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
list.author: Solange Knowles

list.quote: Self-care is the greatest gift you can give yourself and others.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Invest in yourself. You can afford it. Trust me.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
list.author: Lalah Delia

list.quote: Nourishing yourself in a way that helps you blossom in the direction you want to go is attainable, and you are worth the effort.

list.author: L.R. Knost

list.quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
list.author: Ralph Nader

list.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It is about taking care of those in your charge.
list.author: Simon Sinek

list.quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others.
list.author: Douglas MacArthur

list.quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
list.author: Warren Bennis

list.quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
list.author: Ronald Reagan

list.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
list.author: C.S. Lewis

list.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through the good times and the bad times.
list.author: Walter Winchell

list.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
list.author: Woodrow Wilson

list.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
list.author: Walter Winchell

list.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through the good times and the bad times.
list.author: Walter Winchell

list.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
list.author: Elbert Hubbard

list.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through the good times and the bad times.
list.author: Walter Winchell

list.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
list.author: Leo Tolstoy

list.quote: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
list.author: Marthe Troly-Curtin

list.quote: Lost time is never found again.
list.author: Benjamin Franklin

list.quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
list.author: William Penn

list.quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
list.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

list.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
list.author: Chinese Proverb

list.quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'
list.author: Lao Tzu

list.quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
list.author: Theophrastus

list.quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
list.author: Pericles

list.quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately, it kills all its pupils.
list.author: Hector Berlioz

list.quote: Time is a gift that most of us take for granted.
list.author: Cher

list.quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
list.author: Carl Sandburg

list.quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
list.author: Tennessee Williams

list.quote: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
list.author: Jim Rohn

list.quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
list.author: Buddha

list.quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
list.author: John Archibald Wheeler

list.quote: Time is the measurer of all things, but is itself immeasurable, and the grand discloser of all things, but is itself undisclosed.
list.author: Charles Caleb Colton

list.quote: You may delay, but time will not.
list.author: Benjamin Franklin

list.quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
list.author: Faith Baldwin

list.quote: Time slips away like grains of sand never to return again.
list.author: Robin Sharma

list.quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
list.author: George Washington

list.quote: The eternal quest of the human being is to shatter his loneliness.
list.author: Norman Cousins

list.quote: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
list.author: Michel de Montaigne

list.quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
list.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

list.quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
list.author: Keanu Reeves

list.quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
list.author: Marilyn Monroe

list.quote: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not be defined by another person.
list.author: Oscar Wilde

list.quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
list.author: John Muir

list.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
list.author: Albert Einstein

list.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
list.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

list.quote: The poetry of the earth is never dead.
list.author: John Keats

list.quote: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect.
list.author: Alice Walker

list.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
list.author: Lao Tzu

list.quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
list.author: William Shakespeare

list.quote: Nature is not a place to visit. It is home.
list.author: Gary Snyder

list.quote: Choose only one master—nature.
list.author: Rembrandt

list.quote: The clearest way into the universe is through a forest wilderness.
list.author: John Muir

list.quote: To me, a lush carpet of pine needles or spongy grass is more welcome than the most luxurious Persian rug.
list.author: Helen Keller

list.quote: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy.
list.author: Isaac Newton

list.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
list.author: Albert Einstein

list.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.

list.author: Rembrandt

list.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
list.author: Dalai Lama

list.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
list.author: William Saroyan

list.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
list.author: Sydney J. Harris

list.quote: Happiness is the art of never holding in your mind the memory of any unpleasant thing that has passed.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

list.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.
list.author: Charles M. Schulz

list.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
list.author: Marcus Aurelius

list.quote: The only joy in the world is to begin.
list.author: Cesare Pavese

list.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
list.author: Jim Rohn

list.quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, and the secret of freedom is courage.
list.author: Thucydides

list.quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions and not upon our circumstances.
list.author: Martha Washington

list.quote: Happiness is a state of mind. It's just according to the way you look at things.
list.author: Walt Disney

list.quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

list.author: Martha Washington

list.quote: A charming woman doesn't follow the crowd; she is herself.
list.author: Loretta Young

list.quote: The most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
list.author: Beyoncé

list.quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
list.author: Oscar Wilde

list.quote: A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: The best protection any woman can have is courage.
list.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

list.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
list.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

list.quote: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me.
list.author: Ayn Rand

list.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture, and transform.
list.author: Diane Mariechild

list.quote: Women hold up half the sky.
list.author: Mao Zedong

list.quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
list.author: Steve Maraboli

list.quote: Women are the real architects of society.
list.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

list.quote: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world.
list.author: Hillary Clinton

list.quote: A strong woman looks a challenge in the eye and gives it a wink.
list.author: Gina Carey

list.quote: Women are the warriors of compassion.
list.author: Diane von Furstenberg

list.quote: A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

list.quote: The most alluring thing a woman can have is confidence.
list.author: Beyoncé

list.quote: A charming woman doesn't follow the crowd; she is herself.
list.author: Loretta Young

list.quote: Well-behaved women seldom make history.
list.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

list.quote: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me.
list.author: Ayn Rand

list.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture, and transform.
list.author: Diane Mariechild

list.quote: A real man loves his wife, and places his family as the most important thing in life. Nothing has brought me more peace and contentment in life than simply being a good husband and father.
list.author: Frank Abagnale

list.quote: A man is not defined by his muscles, his facial hair, or his chromosomes. He is defined by his heart.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
list.author: Plato

list.quote: Being male is a matter of birth. Being a man is a matter of age. But being a gentleman is a matter of choice.
list.author: Vin Diesel

list.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
list.author: Charles Darwin

list.quote: The strength of a man isn't seen in the width of his shoulders. It's seen in the width of his arms that circle you.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: A man's worth is no greater than his ambitions.
list.author: Marcus Aurelius

list.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
list.author: Thomas Paine

list.quote: A gentleman is one who puts more into the world than he takes out.
list.author: George Bernard Shaw

list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
list.author: Nelson Mandela

list.quote: A real man provides, protects, and perseveres.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Being male is a matter of birth. Being a man is a matter of age. But being a gentleman is a matter of choice.
list.author: Vin Diesel

list.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
list.author: Plato

list.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
list.author: Charles Darwin

list.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

list.quote: A man's worth is no greater than his ambitions.
list.author: Marcus Aurelius

list.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
list.author: Thomas Paine

list.quote: Family is not an important thing, it's everything.
list.author: Michael J. Fox

list.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
list.author: Albert Einstein

list.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
list.author: Princess Diana

list.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
list.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

list.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
list.author: George Santayana

list.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
list.author: Michael J. Fox

list.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
list.author: George Bernard Shaw

list.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
list.author: David Ogden Stiers

list.quote: The love in our family flows strong and deep, leaving us memories to treasure and keep.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is a gift that lasts forever.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the heart of a home.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family: where life begins and love never ends.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the anchor that holds us through life's storms.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the key to happiness.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the compass that guides us.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the light in the darkest moments.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the place where hearts are always open.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the tie that binds us together.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the foundation of love and support.
list.author: Unknown

list.quote: Family is the source of strength and happiness.
list.author: Unknown
